sectionText: GER 465 - Spring 2017   Topic: Einfuehrung in die Linguistik   This course will explore the German language from a linguistic perspective. Topics will include phonetics and phonology, morphology, syntax, semantics, pragmatics, language history, dialects, and sociolinguistics. The course will be taught in German; interested students who have not taken GER 212 or do not have equivalent language proficiency should obtain instructor consent to enroll.
